description:
Roll, roll, roll your boat down to the beach or gently portage it over a variety of terrain. The tires are made from foam, so flats are a thing of the past. They've got the bounce and load-bearing of traditional pneumatic tires, but won't ever go flat ̶ life is but a dream.

  • Marine grade, anodized 6063/T-5 aluminium frame with stainless steel hardware
  • 10-inch detachable wheels with polyurethane foam tires
  • Large foam bumpers protect hull finish
  • Sturdy double-legged kickstand for easy loading
  • Collapsible for easy storage, wheels remove quickly with clip pin
  • 4-meter cam buckle tie-down strap included
  • Weight capacity is 90kg, enough to handle a fully-loaded touring kayak
  • Folded dimensions are 69.5 x 37 x 10cm
name: Canadian River Supply Anodized Aluminum Large Transportation Cart
